mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CRM_CHNG_HST A INNER JOIN CRM_MENU_BAS B ON A.MENU_CD = B.MENU_CD INNER JOIN CRM_USER_BAS C ON A.REGR_ID = C.USER_CD

SELECT A.* , ( SELECT LISTAGG(MENU_NM, '>') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY MENU_LVL_NO) FROM CRM_MENU_BAS WHERE 1=1 START WITH MENU_CD = A.MENU_CD CONNECT BY PRIOR PRNTS_MENU_CD = MENU_CD ) MENU_PATH FROM (
SELECT A.CHNG_HST_CD /*변경이력코드 */ , A.MENU_CD /*메뉴코드 */ , A.CHNG_CALL_URL /*변경호출URL */ , A.CHNG_RSLT_TXN /*변경결과내역 */ , A.CHNG_PARAM_TXN /*변경파라미터내역 */ , A.CHNG_CALL_TXN /*변경호출내역 */ , A.CHNG_CALL_DT /*변경호출일시 */ , A.CHNG_EXEC_MSEC /*변경실행밀리초 */ , A.CHNG_CALL_IP_ADDR /*변경호출IP주소 */ , A.REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , A.REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , A.AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , A.AMD_DT /*수정일시 */ , B.MENU_NM , C.USER_CD , C.USER_NM , C.LOGIN_ID FROM CRM_CHNG_HST A INNER JOIN CRM_MENU_BAS B ON A.MENU_CD = B.MENU_CD INNER JOIN CRM_USER_BAS C ON A.REGR_ID = C.USER_CD
ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
) A

SELECT A.CHNG_HST_CD /*변경이력코드 */ , A.MENU_CD /*메뉴코드 */ , A.CHNG_CALL_URL /*변경호출URL */ , A.CHNG_RSLT_TXN /*변경결과내역 */ , A.CHNG_PARAM_TXN /*변경파라미터내역 */ , A.CHNG_CALL_TXN /*변경호출내역 */ , A.CHNG_CALL_DT /*변경호출일시 */ , A.CHNG_EXEC_MSEC /*변경실행밀리초 */ , A.CHNG_CALL_IP_ADDR /*변경호출IP주소 */ , A.REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , A.REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , A.AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , A.AMD_DT /*수정일시 */ , ( SELECT LISTAGG(MENU_NM, '>') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY MENU_LVL_NO) FROM CRM_MENU_BAS WHERE 1=1 START WITH MENU_CD = A.MENU_CD CONNECT BY PRIOR PRNTS_MENU_CD = MENU_CD ) MENU_PATH , B.MENU_NM , C.USER_CD , C.USER_NM , C.LOGIN_ID FROM CRM_CHNG_HST A INNER JOIN CRM_MENU_BAS B ON A.MENU_CD = B.MENU_CD INNER JOIN CRM_USER_BAS C ON A.REGR_ID = C.USER_CD
